hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select MIN(EOFO.EOFO_RECONCILIATION_DATE) AS EOFO_RECONCILIATION_DATE, MIN(EOFO.EOFO_INVOICE_DATE) AS EOFO_INVOICE_DATE, MIN(EOFO.EOFO_CHARGEOFF_DATE) AS EOFO_CHARGEOFF_DATE from EO_FEE_MANAGEMENT_ORDER EOFO where 1=1 <<AND EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_CODE LIKE :eofoPartyCode>> <<AND EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_NAME LIKE :eofoPartyName>> <<AND EOFO.EOFO_RP_FLAG_CODE LIKE :eofoRpFlagCode>> <<AND EOFO.EOFO_IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF LIKE :eofoIsHaveChargeoff>> <<AND EOFO.ORG_ID=:orgId>>
